description: My kids closed school and now learnig science kee it up

This was my first game ever played... I remember playing this on my old PC - I was searching this game over years, years, and even other years... I'm playing this game again only thanks to Linux and you everyone

This makes me remember of the game 'Two Dots' I played on my mobile phone. There too, we had to make the two objects (dots there, while a dot and a star here) meet. But, 1 thing I've noticed is that I can complete the level here by dropping any object and not only the ball on star, which seems to be a bug.
Petit jeu sympa pour passer le temps.
